de.fhtw.xgl.interpreter
Interface Interpreter

All Known Implementing Classes:
SwingInterpreter
public interface Interpreter

The Interpreter is the core-class of the XML-gui. An interpreter is used to transform an XML-structure into a GUI.
To read an XML-GUI-file and transform it into a GUI do the following: 


        FileInputStream reader = new FileInputStream("gui.xml");
        
        SwingInterpreter interpreter = new SwingInterpreter(new ExampleCallbackHandler());

        DocumentBuilderFactory dbFactory = 
                DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
        dbFactory.setNamespaceAware(true);
        DocumentBuilder builder = dbFactory.newDocumentBuilder();
        Document document = builder.parse(reader);
        interpreter.parseDocument(document);

Author:
Sebastian Heide

Method Detail

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(Widget widget)
This method is called by Widget-objects to send an event to the CallbackHandler.

Parameters:
widget -

parseDocument

public void parseDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                   throws XglInterpreterException
Parses the given XML-document-structure and builds the Gui-structure. The document must be a valid XML-document and a valid GUI-structure. A Window will be created after the process and the GUI becomes visible.

Parameters:
doc - XML-document with the GUI-structure
Throws:
XglInterpreterException

setCallbackHandler

public void setCallbackHandler(CallbackHandler cbh)
Sets the CallbackHandler for this Interpreter (of not done through the constructor).

Parameters:
cbh - CallbackHandler

getCallbackHandler

public CallbackHandler getCallbackHandler()
Returns the CallbackHandler connected with this Interpreter.

Returns:
CallbackHandler that handles GUI-events

getWidgetById

public Widget getWidgetById(int id)
Returns the Widget-object with the specified ID.

Returns:
the Widget-object

addWidget

public void addWidget(int id,
                      Widget w)
This method should not be invoked directly. It adds a widget to the Interpreter's widget-list. Widgets use this method to make themself known to this Interpreter-object.

Parameters:
id - the widget's id
w - the widget itself
